From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2024 American filmFind Me FallingDirected byStelana KlirisWritten byStelana KlirisProduced byStelana KlirisKeith ArnoldSteven ShapiroStarringHarry Connick Jr.Agni ScottAli Fumiko WhitneyCinematographyStephan MetznerEdited byEmilios AvraamMusic byCarlos José AlvarezProductioncompaniesJupiter Peak ProductionsMeraki FilmsDas FilmsDistributed byNetflixRelease date
July 19, 2024 (2024-07-19)
CountriesUnited StatesCyprusLanguageEnglish
Find Me Falling[1] (formerly titled The Islander) is an upcoming romantic comedy film written and directed by Stelana Kliris and starring Harry Connick Jr., Agni Scott and Ali Fumiko Whitney.[2][3]
Find Me Falling is scheduled for release on July 19, 2024 on Netflix.[4]


Cast[edit]
Harry Connick Jr.
Agni Scott
Ali Fumiko Whitney
Tony Demetriou
Lea Maleni
Angeliki Philippidou
Production[edit]
Filming began in Cyprus in May 2022.[5]  Filming specifically occurred in Pegeia and Nicosia.[6]  In November 2022, it was announced that the film was entering the final stage of production.[7]

^ FNE Staff (May 4, 2022). "PRODUCTION: Harry Connick Jr. and Mira Sorvino Shoot US/Cypriot RomCom The Islander". Filmneweurope.com. Retrieved April 28, 2023.
